name: The Platformer Inc.
description:
Controls: WASD to move and SPACE or LMB to continue dialog.

Used japanese-woodblock-1x.png (12×1) (lospec.com)

After a massacre of your coworkers at Platformer Inc. You have to help the surviving platform crafting machine to collect materials required for making a platform for some fat Italian plumber. Collect all of them and return them to the machine so he can make the platform.

Made in 3 days for the Second Hwlo Jam where you had to create a game where the genre is done wrongly.

I have spoofed the platformer genre by making this game into a collectathon about making platformers!  You have to help a machine to make platforms
